info.name: IMDb: Highlight 2015 releases nominated for Oscars
info.description: Quick kludge to make it easier to spot 2015 releases nominated for Oscars in 2016 when browsing showtimes on IMDb. Provides highlighter-style background colors on links to nominated films.
info.additionalInfo: Helpful when browsing IMDb's showtimes, e.g. http://www.imdb.com/showtimes/location/US/90028/ to see what's playing in Hollywood, or browsing the IMDb's Academy Awards landing page. Note that to be truly useful, you'd probably want to keep a local version up to date by moving films you've already seen to the bottom of the list.
